sources.title: Riot (2012) | FULL MOVIE | Crime Drama
sources.description:
Before he took up the badge, London copper Damien was a violent soccer hooligan. Now, with London in the middle of chaos, Damien must decide whether to live with his old crew or protect his city from the rioters burning the town to the ground.

#uk #london #football #movie #drama #crime #riot #projects #towers #soccer #character #dark #police #criminal

metadata.Plot: It is December in the busy city of Windsor, Ontario. University exams have ended and a group of young friends get together for a night on the town. After sampling in a number of vibrant clubs and downtown eateries, they take the party back to Myron's house. The following morning they are awakened in Myron's basement by some strange noises coming from the main floor. They soon come to the realization that someone may have broken into the home... Months have passed and it is now June. Yet the subject of the 'break in' is still fresh on everyone's minds. Suspicions are risen and friendships are broken. Who was behind this traumatizing event? Why did it happen to them? Whether or not these questions are answered, there is no question their lives are forever changed.
metadata.Actors: Christian Pinard, Justin Tessier, Amanda Marshall
